Description.Text:
Ullet Suites is situated opposite Lace Conference Centre in the leafy suburbs of Liverpool, close to Sefton Park, with good transport links to the city centre.

The suites offer comfortable, relaxing accommodation at an affordable price. Each has large spacious bedrooms with high speed internet access. All suites have access to on-site cooking facilities.
Excellent bars and pubs are all within walking distance, as is the world famous Penny Lane, home of The Beatles.

STANDARD - SUITE - Single Suite - Single, Cot
Bathroom Shower, Power Shower, Bath/Shower, En Suite
